ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Tinkering] Activity level
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There are two recipe sections: Recipes and Community Recipes . The Recipes section is the official stuff that actually works in-game, and with the
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, Sep 26, 2000 at 06:28:21PM -0000, Scott McKay wrote:
>
> So I might as well ask.
>
> On fulcrums tinkering website there is a recipe for a skin improver.
> IE 2 lq pelts make a medium. Is this fact or fantasy?

There are two recipe sections: "Recipes" and "Community Recipes".

The "Recipes" section is the official stuff that actually works in-game, and
with the exception of the Power Gloves and the Catapult, is complete.

The "Community Recipes" section is a list of things that people would like
to see. They do not work in game. The Skin Improver is one of these. So
no, it's fantasy.

> Also, I see a standard list of items from animated bait to
> rebreather. Is that it? Looks like there's only about 8 items that
> can be made. Is this comprehensive? (Only got one tinkering book
> myself).

Yep, that's it.

Pasketti of Povar
